title: DayZ Client v0.45 Release
description:
This pack is released by Shadow and Psysim  








----------------------------------Starting the game----------------------------------


No installation should be necessary but if you have any problems try running: _CommonRedistDirectXJun2010DXSETUP.exe

Before launching the game run the: ChangeMyName.bat to set your in-game name.






----------------------------------Server setup---------------------------------------

DayZ Server Launcher.bat will launch a server that will run on your local computer,
The server will not save any progress but an addon can be downloaded for that on the forum or the download page.


More information can be found on the tutorial page and on the forum






Last note: If you have any questions that makes sense to ask visit the irc at:










//Shadow (http://www.dayzsurvival.se)
